column2: "Teofilus
column3: medzi kan akyerɛw nsɛm a ɔfa ndzɛmba nyina a Jesus hyɛɛ ase yɛe na ɔkyerɛkyerɛe no ho;"

column2: "dze kodur da a ɔdze n’ahyɛdze maa n’esuafo a ɔpaa hɔn no wiei no
column3: na wɔnam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn do wɔfaa no kɔr sor no."

column2: "Hɔn so na n’amandzehu ekyir no
column3: oyii noho kyerɛɛ hɔn adaduanan mu mpɛn pii dɛ ɔda ho tse ase dze yɛɛ dasehyɛ
column4: na ɔkyerɛɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn n’ahendzi no ho nsɛm mu."

column2: "Na ɔnye hɔn dzii ehyia no
column3: ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ mma wommfi Jerusalɛm nnkɔ
column4: na mbom wɔntweɔn Egya no n’anohoba no a hom tsee ho asɛm wɔ m’anomu no:"

column2: "dɛ John dze
column3: ɔdze nsu numae
column5: orinndzi nda dodow biara wɔdze Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn bonuma hom."

column2: "Na Jesus nye hɔn hyiae no
column3: wobisaa no dɛ
column5: ana ber yi mu ebɛsan dze ahendzi no ama Israel?"

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Ɔnnyɛ homdze dɛ hom bohu mber anaa mber nkyekyɛmu a Egya no ahyɛ ato hɔ wɔ nankasa no tum mu no."

column2: "Na mbom Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no nya ba hom do a
column3: hom benya ahoɔdzen; na hom bɛyɛ m’adasefo wɔ Jerusalɛm

column2: "Na owiee yinom ka
column3: na wɔrohwɛ no no
column5: na mununkum gyee no fii hɔn enyiwa do."

column2: "Na ɔrokɔ na wɔrohwɛ sor hann no
column3: hwɛ
column4: mbarimba beenu bi hyɛ ntar fufuw begyinaa hɔn nkyɛn
column8: Ɔyɛ dɛn na hom gyina hɔ rohwɛ sor yi? Jesus yi ara a wɔafa no efi hom nkyɛn kɔ sor yi
column9: ɔbɛba dɛmara dɛ mbrɛ hom ehu dɛ ɔrokɔ sor yi."

column2: "Nna wofii koko a wɔfrɛ no Ngo Bepɔw a ɔbɛn Jerusalɛm bɛyɛ da kor kwansin no do sanee baa Jerusalɛm."
"Na wodur kurow no mu no
column3: wɔkɔr abansor hɔ beebi a wɔtse no: Peter nye John nye James nye Andrew
column7: Simon Zealot no nye James ne ba Judas ka ho."

column2: "Yinom nyina dze anokor suoo ntotɔserɛ mpaabɔ mu
column3: wɔnye mbaa bi

column2: "Dɛm aber no mu na Peter soɛree gyinaa enuanom bɛyɛ nyimpa ɔha eduonu no finimfin
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column6: otwar dɛ kyerɛwsɛm a Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no nam David n’anomu asɛm do dzii kan kae wɔ Judas a ɔyɛɛ kwankyerɛfo ma hɔn a wɔkyeer Jesus no ho no

column2: "Wɔkaan no kaa hɛn ho
column3: na wɔmaa no ne kyɛfa wɔ ɔsom yi mu."

column2: "(Oyi na ɔdze n’emumuyɛ ho akatua nyaa asaase
column3: na ɔwɔɔ akɔmfo

column2: "na hɔn a wɔtse Jerusalɛm nyina tsee
column3: ma dɛm ntsi asaase no wɔfrɛ no hɔnankasa hɔn kasaa mu dɛ

column2: "Na wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Ndwom nwoma no mu dɛ
column3: Wɔmma ne tsenabea nyɛ amamfo
column4: Na mma obiara nntsena mu: na
column5: No nhwɛdodwuma no so obi mfa."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbarimba a wɔnye hɛn nantsewee wɔ ber a nna Ewuradze Jesus nye hɛn kɔ ba no nyina
"ofitsi John enuma do dze besi da a wɔfaa no hɛn nkyɛn kɔr sor no
column3: otwar dɛ hɔn mu baako nye hɛn yɛ no wunyan no ho adasefo."

column2: "Na woyii beenu sii hɔ
column3: Josef a wɔfrɛ no Barsabas a wɔtoo no Justus

column2: "Na wɔsɔree see dɛ
column3: Ɔwo Ewuradze a inyim nyimpa akoma mu
column4: kyerɛ beenu yi mu baako a eyi no"

column2: "dɛ ɔmfa ɔsom nye asomafodwuma a Judas hwee ase fii ho
column3: ma ɔaakɔ nankasa ne tsenabea mu no

column2: "Na wɔtwee hɔnho tonto
column3: na tonto no bɔɔ Mattias; na wɔkaan no foraa asomafo dubiako no."
